name: The Miskatonic
description: Explore the most prestigious occult school in North America, The Miskatonic University, in a hilarious dark comedy set after the Lovecraft canon, in which the greatest threat to mankind is its own ambitions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 400 MB RAM Graphics: 1920 X 1080 Storage: 530 MB available space
